General.Name: USA Rare Earth, Inc.
General.Description: USA Rare Earth, Inc. engages in mining, processing, and supplying rare earths and other critical minerals in the United States. The company controls mining rights to the Round Top Mountain, an above-ground mineral deposit near Sierra Blanca, Texas, which holds deposits of rare earths, including both light and heavy rare earths, such as neodymium, dysprosium, and terbium, as well as other critical minerals, such as gallium, beryllium, lithium, and other critical minerals. Its magnets and rare earth minerals are used in various business sectors and industries, including defense, automotive, aviation, industrial, AI Robotics, medical, consumer electronics, and other industries. USA Rare Earth, Inc. was founded in 2019 and is based in Stillwater, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 100 West Airport Road, Stillwater, OK, United States, 74075
